entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sheet Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:36 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 07:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
